casebody.data:
Harrington
v.
Roeder 441P92-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Johnnie L. Harrington, for Harrington, Johnnie L. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of May 2016 by Defendant to Compel: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. Recused
